00167 void CCELFileHeaderData::Clear()
00168 {
00169         m_nRows = 0;
00170         m_nCols = 0;
00171         m_nCells = 0;
00172         if (m_ParameterIndices.size() > 0)
00173                 m_ParameterIndices.clear();
00174         if (m_Parameters.size() > 0)
00175                 m_Parameters.clear();
00176         m_Header = "";
00177         m_Alg = "";
00178         m_Params = "";
00179         m_DatHeader = "";
00180         m_ChipType = "";
00181         m_CellGrid.upperleft.x = 0;
00182         m_CellGrid.upperleft.y = 0;
00183         m_CellGrid.upperright.x = 0;
00184         m_CellGrid.upperright.y = 0;
00185         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x = 0;
00186         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.y = 0;
00187         m_CellGrid.lowerright.x = 0;
00188         m_CellGrid.lowerright.y = 0;
00189         m_Margin = 0;
00190         m_nOutliers = 0;
00191         m_nMasked = 0;
00192         m_Magic = CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER;
00193         m_Version = CELL_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER;
00194 }

00202 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetHeader()
00203 {
00204         SetDatHeader();
00205         char paramString[2000];
00206         snprintf(paramString,sizeof(paramString), "Cols=%d\nRows=%d\nTotalX=%d\nTotalY=%d\nOffsetX=%d\nOffsetY=%d\n"
00207                                 "GridCornerUL=%d %d\nGridCornerUR=%d %d\nGridCornerLR=%d %d\nGridCornerLL=%d %d\n"
00208                                 "Axis-invertX=%d\nAxisInvertY=%d\nswapXY=%d\nDatHeader=%s\nAlgorithm=%s\n",
00209                                 m_nCols, m_nRows,
00210                                 m_nCols, m_nRows,
00211                                 0,0,
00212                                 m_CellGrid.upperleft.x, m_CellGrid.upperleft.y,
00213                                 m_CellGrid.upperright.x, m_CellGrid.upperright.y,
00214                                 m_CellGrid.lowerright.x, m_CellGrid.lowerright.y,
00215                                 m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x, m_CellGrid.lowerleft.y,
00216                                 0,0,0,
00217                                 m_DatHeader.c_str(),
00218                                 m_Alg.c_str());
00219 
00220         m_Header = paramString;
00221         m_Header += "AlgorithmParameters=";
00222         m_Header += GetAlgorithmParameters();
00223         m_Header += "\n";
00224         return m_Header;
00225 }

00233 void CCELFileHeaderData::SetDatHeader()
00234 {
00235         if ((m_ChipType.length() > 0) && (m_DatHeader.length() == 0))
00236         {
00237                 char scanInfo[2000];
00238                 snprintf(scanInfo,sizeof(scanInfo), " %c %c %s.1sq %c %c %c %c %c %c %c %c %c ",
00239                         DELIMCHAR,
00240                         DELIMCHAR,
00241                         m_ChipType.c_str(),
00242                         DELIMCHAR,
00243                         DELIMCHAR,
00244                         DELIMCHAR,
00245                         DELIMCHAR,
00246                         DELIMCHAR,
00247                         DELIMCHAR,
00248                         DELIMCHAR,
00249                         DELIMCHAR,
00250                         DELIMCHAR);
00251                 m_DatHeader = scanInfo;
00252         }
00253         else if ((m_ChipType.length() > 0) && (m_DatHeader.length() > 0))
00254         {
00255                 std::string temp = "";
00256                 std::string::size_type index = m_DatHeader.find(DELIMCHAR);
00257                 if (index != std::string::npos)
00258                 {
00259                         index = m_DatHeader.find(DELIMCHAR, index + 1);
00260                         if (index != std::string::npos)
00261                         {
00262                                 std::string::size_type indexEnd = m_DatHeader.find(".1sq", index);
00263                                 if (indexEnd != std::string::npos)
00264                                 {
00265                                         if (m_DatHeader.substr(index + 2, indexEnd - index) != m_ChipType)
00266                                         {
00267                                                 temp = m_DatHeader.substr(0, index + 2);
00268                                                 temp += m_ChipType;
00269                                                 temp += m_DatHeader.substr(indexEnd);
00270                                         }
00271                                         else 
00272                                                 temp = m_DatHeader;
00273                                 }
00274                                 else
00275                                 {
00276                                         indexEnd = m_DatHeader.find(DELIMCHAR, index + 1);
00277                                         if (indexEnd != std::string::npos)
00278                                         {
00279                                                 if (m_DatHeader.substr(index + 2, indexEnd - index - 1) != m_ChipType)
00280                                                 {
00281                                                         temp = m_DatHeader.substr(0, index + 2);
00282                                                         temp += m_ChipType;
00283                                                         temp += ".1sq";
00284                                                         temp += m_DatHeader.substr(indexEnd);
00285                                                 }
00286                                                 else 
00287                                                         temp = m_DatHeader;
00288                                         }
00289                                 }
00290                         }
00291                         else
00292                                 temp = m_DatHeader;
00293                 }
00294                 else
00295                         temp = m_DatHeader;
00296 
00297                 m_DatHeader = temp;
00298         }
00299 }

00307 
00308 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseDatHeader()
00309 {
00310         const char *pInfo = strstr(m_Header.c_str(), "DatHeader=");
00311         if (pInfo != NULL)
00312         {
00313                 const char *pEnd = strchr(pInfo, '\n');
00314                 if (pEnd != NULL)
00315                 {
00316                         char *str = new char [pEnd - pInfo - 10 + 1];
00317                         strncpy(str, pInfo + 10, pEnd - pInfo - 10);
00318                         str[pEnd - pInfo - 10] = '\0';
00319                         m_DatHeader = str;
00320                         delete [] str;
00321                 }
00322         }
00323 }
00324 
00331 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseChipType()
00332 {
00333         // Determine the array type from the header.
00334         // chip type is between second and third delimiters
00335         const char *pInfo = strchr(m_Header.c_str(), DELIMCHAR);
00336         if (pInfo != NULL)
00337         {
00338                 pInfo = strchr(pInfo + 1, DELIMCHAR);
00339                 if ((pInfo != NULL) && *(++pInfo))  
00340                 {
00341                         pInfo++;
00342                         const char *pEnd = strchr(pInfo, '.');
00343                         if (pEnd == NULL)  
00344                         {
00345                                 pEnd = strchr(pInfo, DELIMCHAR);
00346                                 if (pEnd != NULL)
00347                                         pEnd--;
00348                         }
00349                         if (pEnd != NULL)
00350                         {
00351                                 char *str = new char [pEnd - pInfo + 1];
00352                                 strncpy(str, pInfo, pEnd - pInfo);
00353                                 str[pEnd - pInfo] = '\0';
00354                                 m_ChipType = str;
00355                                 delete [] str;
00356                         }
00357                 }
00358         }
00359 }
00360 
00367 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseAlgorithmParameters()
00368 {
00369         if (m_Params.length() > 0)
00370         {
00371                 int iStart = 0;
00372                 int iEnd = 0;
00373                 int iLen = (int) m_Params.length() - 1;
00374                 std::string tag = "";
00375                 std::string value = "";
00376                 for (int i = 0; i < iLen; i++)
00377                 {
00378                         if ((m_Params.at(i) == ':') || (m_Params.at(i) == '='))
00379                         {
00380                                 tag = m_Params.substr(iStart, (iEnd - iStart + 1));
00381                                 iStart = i + 1;
00382                                 iEnd = iStart;
00383                         }
00384                         else if ((m_Params.at(i) == ';') || (m_Params.at(i) == ' '))
00385                         {
00386                                 value = m_Params.substr(iStart, (iEnd - iStart + 1));
00387                                 AddAlgorithmParameter(tag, value);
00388                                 iStart = i + 1;
00389                                 iEnd = iStart;
00390                         }
00391                         else
00392                                 iEnd = i;
00393                 }
00394                 value = m_Params.substr(iStart, (iEnd - iStart + 2));
00395                 AddAlgorithmParameter(tag, value);
00396         }
00397 }

00408 void CCELFileHeaderData::AddAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag, const char *value)
00409 {
00410         assert(tag != NULL);
00411         assert(value != NULL);
00412 
00413         std::string strTag = tag;
00414         std::string strValue = value;
00415 
00416         AddAlgorithmParameter(strTag, strValue);
00417 }
00418 
00428 void CCELFileHeaderData::AddAlgorithmParameter(std::string& tag, std::string& value)
00429 {
00430         assert(tag != "");
00431         assert(value != "");
00432 
00433         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(tag);
00434         if (pos == m_Parameters.end())
00435         {
00436                 int index = (int) m_Parameters.size() + 1;
00437                 m_ParameterIndices.insert(std::make_pair(index, tag));
00438                 m_Parameters.insert(std::make_pair(tag, value));
00439         }
00440 }

00451 {
00452         assert(tag != NULL);

00456         std::string strValue = value;
00457         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(strTag);
00458         if (pos != m_Parameters.end())
00459                 pos->second = strValue;
00460 }

00490 void CCELFileHeaderData::SetAddAlgorithmParameter(std::string& tag, std::string& value)
00491 {
00492         assert(tag != "");
00493         assert(value != "");
00494 
00495         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(tag);
00496         if (pos != m_Parameters.end()) {
00497                 pos->second = value;
00498         } else {
00499                 int index = (int) m_Parameters.size() + 1;
00500                 m_ParameterIndices.insert(std::make_pair(index, tag));
00501                 m_Parameters.insert(std::make_pair(tag, value));
00502         }
00503 }

00512 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag)
00513 {
00514         assert(tag != NULL);
00515 
00516         std::string strTag = tag;
00517         std::string strValue = "";
00518         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos = m_Parameters.find(strTag);
00519         if (pos != m_Parameters.end())
00520                 strValue = pos->second;
00521         return strValue;
00522 }

00531 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetAlgorithmParameterTag(int index)
00532 {
00533         std::string tag="";
00534         std::map<int, std::string>::iterator pos = m_ParameterIndices.find(index+1);
00535         if (pos != m_ParameterIndices.end())
00536         {
00537                 tag = pos->second;
00538         }
00539         return tag;
00540 }
00541 
00548 std::string CCELFileHeaderData::GetAlgorithmParameters()
00549 {
00550         std::string strBuffer = "";
00551         std::string strTag = "";
00552         std::string strValue = "";
00553         int iCount = 0;
00554         std::map<int, std::string>::iterator posIndex;
00555         std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator pos;
00556         for (int i = 0; i < (int) m_ParameterIndices.size(); i++)
00557         {
00558                 posIndex = m_ParameterIndices.find(i + 1);
00559                 if (posIndex != m_ParameterIndices.end())
00560                 {
00561                         strTag = posIndex->second;
00562                         pos = m_Parameters.find(strTag);
00563                         if (pos != m_Parameters.end())
00564                         {
00565                                 strValue = pos->second;
00566                                 if (iCount > 0) strBuffer.append(";"); 
00567                                 strBuffer.append(strTag);
00568                                 strBuffer.append(":"), 
00569                                 strBuffer.append(strValue);
00570                                 iCount++;
00571                         }
00572                 }
00573         }
00574         return strBuffer;
00575 }

00603         m_CellGrid.upperright.y = grid.upperright.y;
00604         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x = grid.lowerleft.x;

00610 
00617 void CCELFileHeaderData::ParseCorners()
00618 {
00619     // get grid coordinates and size from the header
00620         if (m_Header.length() > 0)
00621         {
00622                 const char* pch = strstr(m_Header.c_str(), "GridCorner");
00623                 int ulx,uly;
00624                 int urx,ury;
00625                 int llx,lly;
00626                 int lrx,lry;
00627                 if ((pch != NULL) &&
00628                         (sscanf(pch, "GridCornerUL=%d %d GridCornerUR=%d %d GridCornerLR=%d %d GridCornerLL=%d %d",
00629                                                 &ulx, &uly,
00630                                                 &urx, &ury,
00631                                                 &lrx, &lry,
00632                                                 &llx, &lly) == 8))
00633                 {
00634                         m_CellGrid.upperleft.x = ulx;
00635                         m_CellGrid.upperleft.y = uly;
00636 
00637                         m_CellGrid.upperright.x = urx;
00638                         m_CellGrid.upperright.y = ury;
00639 
00640                         m_CellGrid.lowerright.x = lrx;
00641                         m_CellGrid.lowerright.y = lry;
00642 
00643                         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.x = llx;
00644                         m_CellGrid.lowerleft.y = lly;
00645                 }
00646         }
00647 }

00655 bool CCELFileData::Exists()
00656 {
00657         assert(m_FileName != "");
00658 
00659         // Find the file stats.
00660         struct stat st;
00661         return ((stat(m_FileName.c_str(), &st) == 0)? true: false);
00662 }
00663 
00670 uint32_t CCELFileData::GetFileSize()
00671 {
00672         assert(m_FileName != "");
00673 
00674         int32_t lSize = 0;
00675         struct stat st;
00676         if (stat(m_FileName.c_str(), &st) == 0)
00677         {
00678                 lSize = st.st_size;
00679         }
00680         return lSize;
00681 }
00682 
00692 bool CCELFileData::Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00693 {
00694         bool retVal = false;
00695 
00696         // First close the file.
00697         Close();
00698 
00699         DetermineFileFormat();
00700         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
00701                 retVal = ReadXDABCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00702         else if (IsTranscriptomeBcelFile())
00703                 retVal = ReadTranscriptomeBCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00704         else if (IsCompactCelFile())
00705                 retVal = ReadCompactBCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00706         else if (IsUnsupportedCompactCelFile())
00707         {
00708                 SetError("This version of compact cel file is no longer supported.");
00709                 retVal = false;
00710         }
00711         else
00712                 retVal = ReadTextCel(bReadHeaderOnly);
00713 
00714         return retVal;
00715 }
00716 
00728 bool CCELFileData::ReadXDABCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00729 {
00730         bool retVal = false;
00731 
00732         // Open the file.
00733         std::ifstream instr;
00734         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00735 
00736         // Check if open
00737         if (!instr)
00738         {
00739                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
00740                 return false;
00741         }
00742 
00743         Clear();
00744 
00745         // Read the header
00746         int iHeaderBytes = 0;
00747         int32_t magic;
00748 
00749         int32_t version;
00750         int32_t nSubGrids;
00751         char *sval=NULL;
00752 
00753         // Read the magic number.
00754         ReadInt32_I(instr, magic);
00755         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00756         m_HeaderData.SetMagic(magic);
00757 
00758         // Check if new type.
00759         if (!(magic==CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER))
00760         {
00761                 SetError("The file does not appear to be the correct format.");
00762                 return false;
00763         }
00764 
00765         // Read the version
00766         ReadInt32_I(instr, version);
00767         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00768         m_HeaderData.SetVersion(version);
00769 
00770         // Read the dimensions of the array
00771         int32_t iValue = 0;
00772         uint32_t ulValue = 0;
00773         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00774         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00775         m_HeaderData.SetRows(iValue);
00776         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00777         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00778         m_HeaderData.SetCols(iValue);
00779         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00780         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00781         m_HeaderData.SetCells(iValue);
00782 
00783         // Read the other members.
00784         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00785         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00786         iHeaderBytes += ((int) strlen(sval));
00787         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(sval);
00788         delete[] sval;
00789         sval = NULL;
00790         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00791         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00792         iHeaderBytes += ((int) strlen(sval));
00793         m_HeaderData.SetAlg(sval);
00794         delete[] sval;
00795         sval = NULL;
00796         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
00797         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00798         iHeaderBytes += ((int) strlen(sval));
00799         m_HeaderData.SetParams(sval);
00800         delete[] sval;
00801         sval = NULL;
00802         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
00803         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00804         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(iValue);
00805         ReadUInt32_I(instr, ulValue);
00806         iHeaderBytes += UINT32_SIZE;
00807         m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(ulValue);
00808         ReadUInt32_I(instr, ulValue);
00809         iHeaderBytes += UINT32_SIZE;
00810         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(ulValue);
00811         ReadInt32_I(instr, nSubGrids);
00812         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
00813 
00814         // Set the chip type and DatHeader
00815         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
00816         m_HeaderData.ParseDatHeader();
00817 
00818         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
00819         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
00820 
00821         // Set grid coordinates
00822         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
00823 
00824         instr.close();
00825 
00826         // Read the remaining data.
00827         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
00828                 return true;
00829 
00830   // This is a double negative as I know that _DONT_USE_MEM_MAPPING_ isnt used
00831   // and I dont want to break the build. People who dont
00832   // want MEMMAPPING (Chuck) can define this
00833 
00835   // #ifndef _DONT_USE_MEM_MAPPING_
00836 
00837   //#if defined(_USE_MEM_MAPPING_)
00838 #ifndef _DONT_USE_MEM_MAPPING_
00839 
00840 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00841         // Memory map file on windows...
00842         SYSTEM_INFO info;
00843         GetSystemInfo(&info);
00844         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00845                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
00846         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00847         {
00848                 SetError("Failed to open the file for win memory mapping.");
00849                 return false;
00850         }
00851         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
00852         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
00853         {
00854                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
00855                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
00856                 {
00857                         Close();
00858                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
00859                         return false;
00860                 }
00861                 else
00862                 {
00863                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
00864                 }
00865         }
00866 #else
00867         // Memory map file on posix...
00868         int32_t lFileSize = GetFileSize();
00869         char* szBuffer = new char[iHeaderBytes + 1];
00870         m_File = fopen(m_FileName.c_str(), "r");
00871         if (m_File == NULL)
00872         {
00873                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
00874                 return false;
00875         }
00876         fread(szBuffer, iHeaderBytes, 1, m_File);
00877   // printf("fpos=%u",ftell(m_File)); // debug
00878         delete [] szBuffer;
00879   
00880     size_t cellf_page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(ftell(m_File));
00881     size_t cellf_page_offset = ftell(m_File) - cellf_page_start;
00882     m_MapLen = lFileSize - cellf_page_start;
00883     m_lpFileMap = mmap(NULL, m_MapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(m_File), cellf_page_start);
00884     //printf("=== mmap: %p\n",m_lpFileMap); //jhg
00885     if (m_lpFileMap == MAP_FAILED)
00886         {
00887                 Close();
00888     static char buf[2048];
00889     sprintf(buf, "Unable to map view for the unix memory map file: %d", errno);
00890                 SetError(buf);
00891                 return false;
00892         }
00893         else
00894         {
00895                 m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + cellf_page_offset;
00896         }
00897         if (m_File != NULL) 
00898         {
00899                 fclose(m_File);
00900                 m_File = NULL;
00901         }
00902 #endif // _MSC_VER
00903 
00904 #else
00905   // No memory mapping ...
00906   // printf("OPEN: non memory mapped.\n"); //
00907   m_lpFileMap=NULL;
00908   m_File=fopen(m_FileName.c_str(),"r");
00909   if (m_File==NULL) {
00910     SetError("Failed to open file for non-memap open.");
00911     return false;
00912   }
00913   // skip the header
00914   fseek(m_File,iHeaderBytes,SEEK_SET);
00915   // printf("fpos=%u",ftell(m_File)); // debug
00916   // read the entire file into memory...
00917   int32_t datasize = GetFileSize()-iHeaderBytes;
00918   m_lpData = new char[datasize];
00919   size_t read=fread(m_lpData,1,datasize,m_File);
00920   //printf("read=%u  iHeaderBytes=%u\n",read,iHeaderBytes);
00921   if (read!=datasize) {
00922     SetError("Unable to read the entire file.");
00923     return false;
00924   }
00925   //
00926   fclose(m_File);
00927 
00928 #endif // _USE_MEM_MAPPING_
00929 
00930         int16_t x=0;
00931         int16_t y=0;
00932         int iCell;
00933 
00934         // "Read" the Mean data
00935         m_pEntries = (CELFileEntryType*)m_lpData;
00936 
00937         // Read the mask data
00938         int iOffset = m_HeaderData.GetCells() * (FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE);
00939         if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
00940         {
00941                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int) m_HeaderData.GetMasked(); iCell++)
00942                 {
00943                         // Read the coordinate.
00944                         x = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE)));
00945                         //x = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
00946                         y = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)));
00947 //                      y = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
00948                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
00949                 }
00950         }
00951                 
00952         // Read the outlier data
00953         iOffset += m_HeaderData.GetMasked() * 2 * SHORT_SIZE;
00954         if (m_bReadOutliers)
00955         {
00956                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int) m_HeaderData.GetOutliers(); iCell++)
00957                 {
00958                         // Read the coordinate.
00959                         x = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE)));
00960                         y = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE)));
00961 //                      x = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
00962 //                      y = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
00963                         m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
00964                 }
00965         }
00966         else
00967                 m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(0);
00968         if (!m_bReadMaskedCells) m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
00969         retVal = true;
00970         return retVal;
00971 }
00972 
00984 bool CCELFileData::ReadTranscriptomeBCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
00985 {
00986         bool retVal = false;
00987 
00988         // Open the file.
00989         std::ifstream instr;
00990         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00991 
00992         // Check if open
00993         if (!instr)
00994         {
00995                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
00996                 return false;
00997         }
00998 
00999         Clear();
01000 
01001         // Read the header
01002         int iHeaderBytes = 0;
01003         float version = 0;
01004         uint32_t ulValue = 0;
01005         uint32_t totalx = 0;
01006         uint32_t totaly = 0;
01007         uint32_t offsetx = 0;
01008         uint32_t offsety = 0;
01009         GridCoordinatesType grid;
01010         unsigned short axisinvertx = 0;
01011         unsigned short axisinverty = 0;
01012         unsigned short swapxy = 0;
01013         std::string scanInfo;
01014         std::string sval;
01015 
01016         // Read the magic number.
01017         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_HEADER_LEN);
01018         iHeaderBytes += BCEL_HEADER_LEN;
01019 
01020         // Check if new type.
01021         if (strncmp(sval.c_str(), BCEL_HEADER_BYTES, BCEL_HEADER_LEN) != 0)
01022         {
01023                 SetError("The file does not appear to be the correct format.");
01024                 return false;
01025         }
01026 
01027         // Read the version
01028         ReadFloat_N(instr, version);
01029         iHeaderBytes += FLOAT_SIZE;
01030         m_HeaderData.SetVersion((int)version);
01031 
01032         // Read header information
01033         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // header struct size
01034         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01035         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01036         ReadFloat_N(instr, version);
01037         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // columns
01038         m_HeaderData.SetCols(ulValue);
01039         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // rows
01040         m_HeaderData.SetRows(ulValue);
01041         ReadUInt32_N(instr, totalx);                                                    // totalx
01042         ReadUInt32_N(instr, totaly);                                                    // totaly
01043         ReadUInt32_N(instr, offsetx);                                                   // offsetx
01044         ReadUInt32_N(instr, offsety);                                                   // offsety
01045         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUL.x
01046         grid.upperleft.x = ulValue;
01047         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUL.y
01048         grid.upperleft.y = ulValue;
01049         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUR.x
01050         grid.upperright.x = ulValue;
01051         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerUR.y
01052         grid.upperright.y = ulValue;
01053         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLL.x
01054         grid.lowerleft.x = ulValue;
01055         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLL.y
01056         grid.lowerleft.y = ulValue;
01057         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLR.x
01058         grid.lowerright.x = ulValue;
01059         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // GridCornerLR.y
01060         grid.lowerright.y = ulValue;
01061         m_HeaderData.SetGridCorners(grid);
01062         ReadUInt16_N(instr, axisinvertx);                                               // Axis-invertX
01063         ReadUInt16_N(instr, axisinverty);                                               // AxisinvertY
01064         ReadUInt16_N(instr, swapxy);                                                    // swapXY
01065         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01066 
01067         // Read DatHeader
01068         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // DatHeader length
01069         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01070         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01071         ReadFixedString(instr, scanInfo, ulValue);
01072         if (scanInfo[ulValue - 1] == '\r') scanInfo[ulValue - 1] = '\0';
01073         m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader(scanInfo.c_str());
01074         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01075 
01076         // Read Algorithm
01077         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // Algorithm length
01078         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01079         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01080         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, ulValue);
01081         if (sval[ulValue - 1] == '\r') sval[ulValue - 1] = '\0';
01082         m_HeaderData.SetAlg(sval.c_str());
01083         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01084 
01085         // Read AlgorithmParameters
01086         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   // AlgorithmParameters length
01087         iHeaderBytes += (2 * UINT32_SIZE + ulValue + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01088         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01089         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, ulValue);
01090         if (sval[ulValue - 1] == '\r') sval[ulValue - 1] = '\0';
01091         m_HeaderData.SetParams(sval.c_str());
01092         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);                                                   
01093 
01094         char paramString[2000];
01095         snprintf(paramString,sizeof(paramString), 
01096           "Cols=%d\nRows=%d\n"
01097           "TotalX=%u\nTotalY=%u\nOffsetX=%u\nOffsetY=%u\n"
01098           "GridCornerUL=%d %d\nGridCornerUR=%d %d\n"
01099           "GridCornerLR=%d %d\nGridCornerLL=%d %d\n"
01100           "Axis-invertX=%d\nAxisInvertY=%d\nswapXY=%d\nDatHeader=%s\n"
01101           "Algorithm=%s\nAlgorithmParameters=",
01102           m_HeaderData.GetCols(),m_HeaderData.GetRows(),
01103           totalx,totaly,offsetx,offsety,
01104           grid.upperleft.x,grid.upperleft.y,
01105           grid.upperright.x,grid.upperright.y,
01106           grid.lowerright.x,grid.lowerright.y,
01107           grid.lowerleft.x,grid.lowerleft.y,
01108           axisinvertx,axisinverty,swapxy,
01109           scanInfo.c_str(),
01110           m_HeaderData.GetAlg().c_str());
01111         std::string param = paramString;
01112         param += m_HeaderData.GetParams();
01113         param += "\n";
01114         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(param.c_str());
01115 
01116         // Read cell size
01117         ReadUInt32_N(instr, ulValue);
01118         int iOffset = ulValue;
01119         m_HeaderData.SetCells(ulValue / STRUCT_SIZE_FEATURE_DATA);
01120         ReadFixedString(instr, sval, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01121         iHeaderBytes += (UINT32_SIZE + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01122 
01123         // Set the chip type
01124         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
01125 
01126         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
01127         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
01128         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(atoi(m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameter("CellMargin").c_str()));
01129 
01130         // Set grid coordinates
01131         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
01132 
01133         // Read the remaining data.
01134         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
01135                 return true;
01136 
01137         instr.close();
01138 
01139         // Memory map file
01140 #ifdef _MSC_VER
01141         SYSTEM_INFO info;
01142         GetSystemInfo(&info);
01143         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
01144                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
01145         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
01146         {
01147                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01148                 return false;
01149         }
01150         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
01151         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
01152         {
01153                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
01154                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
01155                 {
01156                         Close();
01157                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
01158                         return false;
01159                 }
01160                 else
01161                 {
01162                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
01163                 }
01164         }
01165 #else
01166         int32_t lFileSize = GetFileSize();
01167         char* szBuffer = new char[iHeaderBytes + 1];
01168         m_File = fopen(m_FileName.c_str(), "r");
01169         if (m_File == NULL)
01170         {
01171                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01172                 return false;
01173         }
01174         fread(szBuffer, iHeaderBytes, 1, m_File);
01175         delete [] szBuffer;
01176 
01177     size_t cellf_page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(ftell(m_File));
01178     size_t cellf_page_offset = ftell(m_File) - cellf_page_start;
01179 #ifdef __CYGWIN__
01180         cellf_page_offset -= 1;
01181 #endif
01182     m_MapLen = lFileSize - cellf_page_start;
01183     m_lpFileMap = mmap(NULL, m_MapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(m_File), cellf_page_start);
01184     if (m_lpFileMap == MAP_FAILED)
01185         {
01186                 Close();
01187     static char buf[2048];
01188     sprintf(buf, "Unable to map view for the unix memory map file: %d", errno);
01189                 SetError(buf);
01190                 return false;
01191         }
01192         else
01193         {
01194                 m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + cellf_page_offset;
01195         }
01196         if (m_File != NULL) 
01197         {
01198                 fclose(m_File);
01199                 m_File = NULL;
01200         }
01201 #endif
01202 
01203         // Read the Mean data
01204         uint32_t x = 0;
01205         uint32_t y = 0;
01206         int iCell;
01207         m_pTransciptomeEntries = (CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType*) m_lpData;
01208 
01209         // Read mask size
01210         iOffset = m_HeaderData.GetCells() * STRUCT_SIZE_FEATURE_DATA + UINT32_SIZE;
01211         ulValue = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset));
01212         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(ulValue / STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR);
01213         iOffset += (UINT32_SIZE + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01214 
01215         // Read the mask data
01216         if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01217         {
01218                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int)m_HeaderData.GetMasked(); iCell++)
01219                 {
01220                         // Read the coordinate.
01221                         x = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE));
01222                         y = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE + UINT32_SIZE));
01223                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01224                 }
01225         }
01226         iOffset += (m_HeaderData.GetMasked() * STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR + UINT32_SIZE);
01227 
01228         // Read outlier size
01229         ulValue = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset));
01230         m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(ulValue / STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR);
01231         iOffset += (UINT32_SIZE + BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
01232 
01233         // Read the outlier data
01234         if (m_bReadOutliers)
01235         {
01236                 for (iCell = 0; iCell < (int)m_HeaderData.GetOutliers(); iCell++)
01237                 {
01238                         // Read the coordinate.
01239                         x = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE));
01240                         y = MmGetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * UINT32_SIZE + UINT32_SIZE));
01241                         m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01242                 }
01243         }
01244         else
01245                 m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(0);
01246         if (!m_bReadMaskedCells) m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01247 
01248         retVal = true;
01249         return retVal;
01250 }
01251 
01261 bool CCELFileData::ReadCompactBCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
01262 {
01263         bool retVal = false;
01264 
01265         // Open the file.
01266         std::ifstream instr;
01267         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
01268 
01269         // Check if open
01270         if (!instr)
01271         {
01272                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
01273                 return false;
01274         }
01275 
01276         Clear();
01277 
01278         // Read the header
01279         int iHeaderBytes = 0;
01280         int32_t version;
01281         int32_t nSubGrids;
01282         char *sval = NULL;
01283 
01284         // Read the magic number.
01285         std::string magic;
01286         ReadFixedString(instr, magic, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
01287         iHeaderBytes += CCEL_HEADER_LEN;
01288 
01289         // Check if new type.
01290         if (strncmp(magic.c_str(), CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN) != 0)
01291         {
01292                 SetError("The file does not appear to be the correct format.");
01293                 return false;
01294         }
01295 
01296         // Read the version
01297         ReadInt32_I(instr, version);
01298         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01299         m_HeaderData.SetVersion(version);
01300 
01301         // Read the dimensions of the array
01302         int32_t iValue = 0;
01303         uint32_t ulValue = 0;
01304         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01305         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01306         m_HeaderData.SetRows(iValue);
01307         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01308         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01309         m_HeaderData.SetCols(iValue);
01310         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01311         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01312         m_HeaderData.SetCells(iValue);
01313 
01314         // Read the other members.
01315         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01316         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01317         iHeaderBytes += ((int) strlen(sval));
01318         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(sval);
01319         delete[] sval;
01320         sval = NULL;
01321         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01322         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01323         iHeaderBytes += ((int) strlen(sval));
01324         m_HeaderData.SetAlg(sval);
01325         delete[] sval;
01326         sval = NULL;
01327         ReadCString_I(instr, sval);
01328         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01329         iHeaderBytes += ((int) strlen(sval));
01330         m_HeaderData.SetParams(sval);
01331         delete[] sval;
01332         sval = NULL;
01333         ReadInt32_I(instr, iValue);
01334         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01335         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(iValue);
01336 
01337         // Added -- causes backwards compatability issues w/ earlier pre-releases
01338         ReadUInt32_I(instr, ulValue);
01339         iHeaderBytes += UINT32_SIZE;
01340         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(ulValue);
01341 
01342         ReadInt32_I(instr, nSubGrids);
01343         iHeaderBytes += INT_SIZE;
01344         // This hack needs to be changed. In short, the application of ccel to date
01345         // is on chips with 0 sub grids reported. If we are dealing with a ccel file
01346         // from a pre inclusion of mask values we will get non-zero subgrids. Hence
01347         // the assert:
01348         assert(nSubGrids == 0);
01349 
01350         // Set the chip type and DatHeader
01351         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
01352         m_HeaderData.ParseDatHeader();
01353 
01354         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
01355         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
01356 
01357         // Set grid coordinates
01358         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
01359 
01360         instr.close();
01361 
01362         // Read the remaining data.
01363         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
01364                 return true;
01365 
01366         // Memory map file
01367 #ifdef _MSC_VER
01368         SYSTEM_INFO info;
01369         GetSystemInfo(&info);
01370         m_hFile = CreateFile(m_FileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
01371                         NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL/*FILE_FLAG_RANDOM_ACCESS*/);
01372         if (m_hFile == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
01373         {
01374                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01375                 return false;
01376         }
01377         m_hFileMap = CreateFileMapping(m_hFile, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, 0, 0, NULL);
01378         if (m_hFileMap != NULL)
01379         {
01380                 m_lpFileMap = MapViewOfFile(m_hFileMap, FILE_MAP_READ, 0, 0, 0);
01381                 if (m_lpFileMap == NULL)
01382                 {
01383                         Close();
01384                         SetError("Unable to map view for the win memory map file.");
01385                         return false;
01386                 }
01387                 else
01388                 {
01389                         m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + iHeaderBytes;
01390                 }
01391         }
01392 #else
01393         int32_t lFileSize = GetFileSize();
01394         char* szBuffer = new char[iHeaderBytes + 1];
01395         m_File = fopen(m_FileName.c_str(), "r");
01396         if (m_File == NULL)
01397         {
01398                 SetError("Failed to open the file for memory mapping.");
01399                 return false;
01400         }
01401         fread(szBuffer, iHeaderBytes, 1, m_File);
01402         delete [] szBuffer;
01403 
01404     size_t cellf_page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(ftell(m_File));
01405     size_t cellf_page_offset = ftell(m_File) - cellf_page_start;
01406 #ifdef __CYGWIN__
01407         cellf_page_offset -= 1;
01408 #endif
01409     m_MapLen = lFileSize - cellf_page_start;
01410     m_lpFileMap = mmap(NULL, m_MapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(m_File), cellf_page_start);
01411     if (m_lpFileMap == MAP_FAILED)
01412         {
01413                 Close();
01414     static char buf[2048];
01415     sprintf(buf, "Unable to map view for the unix memory map file: %d", errno);
01416                 SetError(buf);
01417                 return false;
01418         }
01419         else
01420         {
01421                 m_lpData = (char *)(m_lpFileMap) + cellf_page_offset;
01422         }
01423         if (m_File != NULL) 
01424         {
01425                 fclose(m_File);
01426                 m_File = NULL;
01427         }
01428 #endif
01429 
01430         // Read the Mean data
01431         m_pMeanIntensities = (uint16_t*)m_lpData;
01432 
01433         // Read the mask data
01434         int16_t x=0;
01435         int16_t y=0;
01436         int iOffset = m_HeaderData.GetCells() * USHORT_SIZE;
01437         if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01438         {
01439                 for (int iCell = 0; iCell < (int) m_HeaderData.GetMasked(); iCell++)
01440                 {
01441                         // Read the coordinate.
01442                         x = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * USHORT_SIZE)));
01443                         //x = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01444                         y = ((int16_t)MmGetUInt16_I((uint16_t*)(m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * USHORT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE)));
01445 //                      y = GetShort((short*) (m_lpData + iOffset + iCell * 2 * SHORT_SIZE + SHORT_SIZE), m_FileFormat);
01446                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x, true));
01447                 }
01448         }
01449         else
01450                 m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01451                 
01452         retVal = true;
01453         return retVal;
01454 }
01455   
01462 void CCELFileData::EnsureNotMmapped() 
01463 {
01464         // skip if not mmapped...
01465         if (m_lpFileMap==NULL)
01466         {
01467                 return;
01468         }
01469 
01470         // it is mmapped, so fix it.
01471         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL) // the (short,short,char) format
01472         { 
01473                 assert(m_pTransciptomeEntries != NULL);
01474 
01475                 // duplicate the data
01476                 size_t bytecnt = GetCols() * GetRows() * sizeof(CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType);
01477                 CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType *tmpptr = (CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType *) malloc(bytecnt);
01478                 memcpy(tmpptr, m_pTransciptomeEntries, bytecnt);
01479 
01480                 // discard the old map
01481                 Munmap();
01482 
01483                 // put it in place
01484                 m_pTransciptomeEntries = tmpptr;
01485         } 
01486         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) // the (float,float,short) format
01487         { 
01488                 assert(m_pEntries != NULL);
01489 
01490                 // duplicate the data
01491                 size_t bytecnt = GetCols() * GetRows() * sizeof(CELFileEntryType);
01492                 CELFileEntryType *tmpptr = (CELFileEntryType *) malloc(bytecnt);
01493                 memcpy(tmpptr, m_pEntries, bytecnt);
01494 
01495                 // discard the old map
01496                 Munmap();
01497 
01498                 // put it in place
01499                 m_pEntries = tmpptr;
01500         }
01501         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) // the (short) format
01502         { 
01503                 assert(m_pMeanIntensities != NULL);
01504 
01505                 // duplicate the data
01506                 size_t bytecnt = GetCols() * GetRows() * sizeof(unsigned short);
01507                 unsigned short *tmpptr = (unsigned short *) malloc(bytecnt);
01508                 memcpy(tmpptr, m_pMeanIntensities, bytecnt);
01509 
01510                 // discard the old map
01511                 Munmap();
01512 
01513                 // put it in place
01514                 m_pMeanIntensities = tmpptr;
01515         }
01516 }
01517 
01528 bool CCELFileData::ReadTextCel(bool bReadHeaderOnly)
01529 {
01530         bool retVal = false;
01531 
01532         // Open the file.
01533         std::ifstream instr;
01534         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
01535 
01536         // Check if open
01537         if (!instr)
01538         {
01539                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
01540                 return false;
01541         }
01542 
01543         Clear();
01544 
01545         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 4096;
01546         char pszHeader[MAXLINELENGTH];
01547         char tempStr[MAXLINELENGTH];
01548 
01549         // Extract a line of header
01550         instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01551 
01552         //Determine the version number
01553         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[CEL]",5)==0)
01554                 m_HeaderData.SetVersion(3);
01555         else if (strncmp(pszHeader,"COLS/ROWS=",10)==0)
01556                 m_HeaderData.SetVersion(2);
01557         else
01558         {
01559                 SetError("Unrecognized CEL file format.");
01560                 return false;
01561         }
01562 
01563         //read and store the header
01564         if (m_HeaderData.GetVersion() == 2)
01565         {
01566                 m_HeaderData.SetHeader(pszHeader);
01567                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01568                 m_HeaderData.AppendHeader(pszHeader);
01569                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01570 
01571                 // Store rows and columns
01572                 int iCols = 0;
01573                 int iRows = 0;
01574                 sscanf(m_HeaderData.GetHeader().c_str(), "COLS/ROWS=%d %d", &iCols, &iRows);
01575                 m_HeaderData.SetCols(iCols);
01576                 m_HeaderData.SetRows(iRows);
01577                 m_HeaderData.SetCells(iCols*iRows);
01578         }
01579         else
01580         {
01581                 bool moreSpace=true;
01582                 //Read past [HEADER] to first line of header data
01583                 while (moreSpace)
01584                 {
01585                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH))
01586                                 return false;
01587                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[HEADER]",8)==0)
01588                                 moreSpace=false;
01589                 }
01590                 int iCols = 0;
01591                 int iRows = 0;
01592                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01593                 sscanf(pszHeader,"Cols=%d",&iCols);
01594                 m_HeaderData.SetCols(iCols);
01595                 m_HeaderData.SetHeader(pszHeader);
01596                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01597                 sscanf(pszHeader,"Rows=%d",&iRows);
01598                 m_HeaderData.SetRows(iRows);
01599                 m_HeaderData.AppendHeader(pszHeader);
01600                 m_HeaderData.SetCells(iRows*iCols);
01601 
01602                 //Now read the rest of the header
01603                 bool moreHeader=true;
01604                 while (moreHeader)
01605                 {
01606                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH))
01607                                 return false;
01608                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"DatHeader=",10)==0) //Last line of the header
01609                         {
01610                 if (pszHeader[strlen(pszHeader) - 1] == '\r') pszHeader[strlen(pszHeader) - 1] = '\0';
01611                                 m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader(pszHeader + 10);
01612                         }
01613 
01614                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"Algorithm=",10)==0) //Last line of the header
01615                         {
01616                                 sscanf(pszHeader,"Algorithm=%s",tempStr);
01617                                 m_HeaderData.SetAlg(tempStr);
01618                         }
01619 
01620                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"AlgorithmParameters=",20)==0) //Last line of the header
01621                         {
01622                                 sscanf(pszHeader,"AlgorithmParameters=%s",tempStr);
01623                                 m_HeaderData.SetParams(tempStr);
01624                                 moreHeader=false;
01625                         }
01626                         m_HeaderData.AppendHeader(pszHeader);
01627                 }
01628         }
01629 
01630         // Set the chip type
01631         m_HeaderData.ParseChipType();
01632 
01633         // Parse algorithm parameters into map
01634         m_HeaderData.ParseAlgorithmParameters();
01635         m_HeaderData.SetMargin(atoi(m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameter("CellMargin").c_str()));
01636 
01637         // Set grid coordinates
01638         m_HeaderData.ParseCorners();
01639 
01640         char paramString[2000];
01641         GridCoordinatesType grid = m_HeaderData.GetGridCorners();
01642         snprintf(paramString,sizeof(paramString), "Cols=%d\nRows=%d\nTotalX=%d\nTotalY=%d\nOffsetX=%d\nOffsetY=%d\n"
01643                                 "GridCornerUL=%d %d\nGridCornerUR=%d %d\nGridCornerLR=%d %d\nGridCornerLL=%d %d\n"
01644                                 "Axis-invertX=%d\nAxisInvertY=%d\nswapXY=%d\nDatHeader=%s"
01645                                 "\nAlgorithm=%s\nAlgorithmParameters=",
01646                                 m_HeaderData.GetCols(),m_HeaderData.GetRows(),
01647                                 m_HeaderData.GetCols(),m_HeaderData.GetRows(),
01648                                 0,0,
01649                                 grid.upperleft.x, grid.upperleft.y,
01650                                 grid.upperright.x, grid.upperright.y,
01651                                 grid.lowerright.x, grid.lowerright.y,
01652                                 grid.lowerleft.x, grid.lowerleft.y,
01653                                 0,0,0,
01654                                 m_HeaderData.GetDatHeader().c_str(),
01655                                 m_HeaderData.GetAlg().c_str());
01656         std::string param = paramString;
01657         param += m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters();
01658         param += "\n";
01659         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(param.c_str());
01660 
01661         // Don't continue if just reading the header.
01662         if (bReadHeaderOnly)
01663                 return true;
01664 
01665         // Create memory for Mean data.
01666         m_HeaderData.SetCells(m_HeaderData.GetRows() * m_HeaderData.GetCols());
01667         m_pEntries = new CELFileEntryType[m_HeaderData.GetCells()];
01668 
01669         int t_x,t_y,t_pixels;
01670         float t_mean,t_stdv;
01671 
01672         // Read v2 CEL files
01673         if (m_HeaderData.GetVersion() == 2)
01674         {
01675                 // Write the Mean data
01676                 const char *strCellEntryFormat="%d %d %f %f %d";
01677                 for (int iCell=0; iCell < m_HeaderData.GetCells(); iCell++)
01678                 {
01679                         instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01680                         sscanf(pszHeader, strCellEntryFormat,          
01681                                 &t_x,
01682                                 &t_y,
01683                                 &t_mean,
01684                                 &t_stdv,
01685                                 &t_pixels);
01686                         SetIntensity(t_x,t_y,t_mean);
01687                         SetStdv(t_x,t_y,t_stdv);
01688                         SetPixels(t_x,t_y,t_pixels);
01689                 }
01690                 retVal = true;
01691         }
01692         else
01693         {
01694                 //Advance to the beginning of the Mean data
01695                 bool readMore=true;
01696                 while(readMore)
01697                 {
01698                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH))
01699                                 return false;
01700                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[INTENSITY]",11)==0)
01701                                 readMore=false;
01702                 }
01703                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//Data starts at 2 lines past [Mean]
01704                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//Data starts at 2 lines past [Mean]
01705 
01706                 //Read the Mean data
01707                 int iCell=0;
01708                 readMore=true;
01709                 const char *strCellEntryFormat="%d\t%d\t%f\t%f\t%d";
01710 
01711                 while (readMore)
01712                 {
01713                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01714                                 readMore=false;
01715                         else if (strlen(pszHeader) < MIN_CELLSTR )// blank line at end of data
01716                                 readMore=false;
01717                         else
01718                         {
01719                                 sscanf(pszHeader, strCellEntryFormat,          
01720                                         &t_x,
01721                                         &t_y,
01722                                         &t_mean,
01723                                         &t_stdv,
01724                                         &t_pixels);
01725                                 SetIntensity(t_x,t_y,t_mean);
01726                                 SetStdv(t_x,t_y,t_stdv);
01727                                 SetPixels(t_x,t_y,t_pixels);
01728                                 ++iCell;
01729                         }
01730                 }
01731 
01732                 //Advance to the Masked data
01733                 readMore=true;
01734                 while(readMore)
01735                 {
01736                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01737                                 return false;
01738                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[MASKS]",7)==0)
01739                                 readMore=false;
01740                 }
01741                 //Read number of masked cells
01742                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01743                 int nMasked=0;
01744                 sscanf(pszHeader, "NumberCells=%d", &nMasked);
01745 
01746                 m_HeaderData.SetMasked(nMasked);
01747                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//skip over the header
01748 
01749                 //Read the masked data
01750                 if (m_bReadMaskedCells)
01751                 {
01752                         readMore=true;
01753                         while (readMore)
01754                         {
01755                                 if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01756                                         readMore=false;
01757                                 else if (strlen(pszHeader) < MIN_CELLSTR )// blank line at end of data
01758                                         readMore=false;
01759                                 else
01760                                 {
01761                                         int x, y, iCellEntry;
01762                                         sscanf(pszHeader, "%d\t%d", &x, &y);
01763                                         iCellEntry = y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x;
01764                                         m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(iCellEntry, true));
01765                                 }
01766                         }
01767                 }
01768                 else 
01769                         m_HeaderData.SetMasked(0);
01770 
01771                 //Advance to the outlier data
01772                 readMore=true;
01773                 while(readMore)
01774                 {
01775                         if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01776                                 return false;
01777                         if (strncmp(pszHeader,"[OUTLIERS]",10)==0)
01778                                 readMore=false;
01779                 }
01780                 //Read number of outlier cells
01781                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
01782                 int nOutliers=0;
01783                 sscanf(pszHeader, "NumberCells=%d", &nOutliers);
01784                 m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(nOutliers);
01785                 instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);//skip over the header
01786 
01787                 //Read the outlier data
01788                 if (m_bReadOutliers)
01789                 {
01790                         readMore=true;
01791                         while (readMore)
01792                         {
01793                                 if (!instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH)) //end of file
01794                                         readMore=false;
01795                                 else if (strlen(pszHeader) < MIN_CELLSTR )// blank line at end of data
01796                                         readMore=false;
01797                                 else
01798                                 {
01799                                         int x, y, iCellEntry;
01800                                         sscanf(pszHeader, "%d\t%d", &x, &y);
01801                                         iCellEntry = y * m_HeaderData.GetCols() + x;
01802                                         m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(iCellEntry, true));
01803                                 }
01804                         }
01805                 }
01806                 else
01807                         m_HeaderData.SetOutliers(0);
01808                 retVal = true;
01809         }
01810         instr.close();
01811         return retVal;
01812 }
01813 
01820 void CCELFileData::Clear()
01821 {
01822   // throw away our memmap on the way out.
01823   Munmap();
01824 
01825         m_HeaderData.Clear();
01826         m_MaskedCells.clear();
01827         m_Outliers.clear();
01828 
01829   delete [] m_pEntries; 
01830   m_pEntries=NULL;
01831   delete [] m_pTransciptomeEntries; 
01832         m_pTransciptomeEntries = NULL;
01833   delete [] m_pMeanIntensities; 
01834         m_pMeanIntensities = NULL;
01835 }
01836 
01843 void CCELFileData::Munmap() 
01844 {
01845         // If there isnt a mapping we dont have to munmap...
01846         if (m_lpFileMap == NULL) {
01847     // ...but we should get rid of memory which might have been alloced.
01848     delete [] m_pEntries;
01849     m_pEntries=NULL;
01850                 return;
01851         }
01852 
01853         // zero out the pointers which are now invalid... 
01854   m_lpData = NULL;
01855         m_pTransciptomeEntries = NULL;
01856         m_pEntries = NULL;
01857         m_pMeanIntensities = NULL;
01858 
01859         // free the map
01860 #ifdef _MSC_VER
01861         if (m_lpFileMap != NULL)
01862         {
01863                 UnmapViewOfFile(m_lpFileMap);
01864                 CloseHandle(m_hFileMap);
01865                 m_hFileMap = NULL;
01866                 CloseHandle(m_hFile);
01867                 m_hFile = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
01868         }
01869 #else
01870         if ((m_lpFileMap != MAP_FAILED) && (m_lpFileMap != NULL))
01871         {
01872     //printf("=== unmap %p\n",m_lpFileMap); // jhg
01873                 munmap(m_lpFileMap, m_MapLen);
01874                 // m_lpFileMap = MAP_FAILED; // why?
01875                 m_MapLen = 0;
01876                 // should be closed already.
01877                 if (m_File != NULL) 
01878                 {
01879                         fclose(m_File);
01880                         m_File = NULL;
01881                 }
01882         }
01883 #endif
01884   m_lpFileMap=NULL;
01885 }
01886 
01893 void CCELFileData::Close()
01894 {
01895         Clear();
01896 }
01897 
01907 bool CCELFileData::ReadHeader()
01908 {
01909         // Read the header, close if failed.
01910         if (Open(true) == false)
01911         {
01912                 Close();
01913                 return false;
01914         }
01915         return true;
01916 }
01917 
01928 bool CCELFileData::Read(bool bIncludeMaskAndOutliers)
01929 {
01930         m_bReadMaskedCells = bIncludeMaskAndOutliers;
01931         m_bReadOutliers = bIncludeMaskAndOutliers;
01932 
01933         // Open the file
01934         if (Open() == false)
01935         {
01936                 Close();
01937                 return false;
01938         }
01939         return true;
01940 }
01941 
01960 bool CCELFileData::ReadEx(const char *filename, int nState)
01961 {
01962         m_nReadState = nState;
01963 
01964         // Open the file
01965         SetFileName(filename);
01966 
01967         // Determine if outliers should be read
01968         if ((nState & (CEL_ALL | CEL_OUTLIER)))
01969                 this->m_bReadOutliers = true;
01970         else
01971                 this->m_bReadOutliers = false;
01972 
01973         // Determine if masks should be read
01974         if ((nState & (CEL_ALL | CEL_MASK)))
01975                 this->m_bReadMaskedCells = true;
01976         else
01977                 this->m_bReadMaskedCells = false;
01978 
01979         if (Open() == false)
01980         {
01981                 Close();
01982                 return false;
01983         }
01984         return true;
01985 }

01987 
01989 #define SVALUE_LENGTH 50
01990 
01998 
01999 std::string CCELFileData::GetHeaderKey(const char* key)
02000 {
02001         assert(key != NULL);
02002 
02003         std::string strKey = key;
02004         std::transform(strKey.begin(), strKey.end(), strKey.begin(), toupper);
02005 
02006 
02007 
02008         if (strKey == "HEADER")
02009                 return GetHeaderString();
02010         else if (strKey == "VERSION")
02011         {
02012                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02013                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetVersion());
02014                 return sValue;
02015         }
02016         else if (strKey == "COLS")
02017         {
02018                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02019                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetCols());
02020                 return sValue;
02021         }
02022         else if (strKey == "ROWS")
02023         {
02024                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02025                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetRows());
02026                 return sValue;
02027         }
02028         else if (strKey == "TOTALX")
02029         {
02030                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02031                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetCols());
02032                 return sValue;
02033         }
02034         else if (strKey == "TOTALY")
02035         {
02036                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02037                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetRows());
02038                 return sValue;
02039         }
02040         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERUL")
02041         {
02042                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02043                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().upperleft.x, GetGridCorners().upperleft.y);
02044                 return sValue;
02045         }
02046         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERUR")
02047         {
02048                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02049                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().upperright.x, GetGridCorners().upperright.y);
02050                 return sValue;
02051         }
02052         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERLL")
02053         {
02054                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02055                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().lowerleft.x, GetGridCorners().lowerleft.y);
02056                 return sValue;
02057         }
02058         else if (strKey == "GRIDCORNERLR")
02059         {
02060                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02061                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "(%d, %d)", GetGridCorners().lowerright.x, GetGridCorners().lowerright.y);
02062                 return sValue;
02063         }
02064         else if (strKey == "OFFSETX")
02065                 return "0";
02066         else if (strKey == "OFFSETY")
02067                 return "0";
02068         else if (strKey == "AXIS-INVERTX")
02069                 return "0";
02070         else if (strKey == "AXISINVERTY")
02071                 return "0";
02072         else if (strKey == "SWAPXY")
02073                 return "0";
02074         else if (strKey == "DATHEADER")
02075                 return GetDatHeader();
02076         else if (strKey == "ALGORITHM")
02077                 return GetAlg();
02078         else if (strKey == "ALGORITHMPARAMETERS")
02079                 return GetParams();
02080         else if (strKey == "NUMBERCELLS")
02081         {
02082                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02083                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetNumCells());
02084                 return sValue;
02085         }
02086         else if (strKey == "NUMBERMASKEDCELLS")
02087         {
02088                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02089                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetNumMasked());
02090                 return sValue;
02091         }
02092         else if (strKey == "NUMBEROUTLIERCELLS")
02093         {
02094                 char* sValue = new char[SVALUE_LENGTH];
02095                 snprintf(sValue,SVALUE_LENGTH, "%d", GetNumOutliers());
02096                 return sValue;
02097         }
02098         return "";
02099 }
02100 
02101 #undef SVALUE_LENGTH // dont need this any more.
02102 
02103 
02112 void CCELFileData::GetEntry(int x, int y, CELFileEntryType &entry) 
02113 { 
02114         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02115         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02116 
02117         GetEntry(XYToIndex(x,y), entry); 
02118 }
02119 
02127 void CCELFileData::GetEntry(int index, CELFileEntryType &entry) 
02128 { 
02129         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02130 
02131         entry.Intensity = GetIntensity(index);
02132         entry.Stdv = GetStdv(index);
02133         entry.Pixels = GetPixels(index);
02134 }

02176 float CCELFileData::GetIntensity(int x, int y) 
02177 { 
02178         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02179         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));
02180

02183 
02191 float CCELFileData::GetIntensity(int index)
02192 {
02193         float fIntensity = 0;
02194 
02195         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02196 
02197         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) 
02198         {
02199                 //fIntensity = m_pEntries[index].Mean;
02200                 fIntensity=MmGetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Intensity);
02201         }
02202         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) 
02203         {
02204                 //fIntensity = GetFloat(&(m_pEntries[index].Intensity), m_FileFormat);
02205                 fIntensity=MmGetFloat_I(&(m_pEntries[index].Intensity));
02206         }
02207         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL) 
02208         {
02209                 //fIntensity = (float) (GetUShort(&(m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Intensity), m_FileFormat));
02210                 fIntensity=MmGetUInt16_N(&(m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Intensity));
02211         }
02212         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) 
02213         {
02214                 //fIntensity = (float) (GetUShort(m_pMeanIntensities + index, m_FileFormat));
02215                 fIntensity=MmGetUInt16_I(&m_pMeanIntensities[index]);
02216         }
02217         else 
02218         {
02219                 assert(0);
02220         }
02221 
02222         return fIntensity;
02223 }

02389 bool CCELFileData::IsXDACompatibleFile()
02390 {
02391         // Open the file.
02392         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02393         if (!instr)
02394                 return 0;
02395 
02396         // Read the magic number from the file.
02397         uint32_t magic=0;
02398         ReadUInt32_I(instr, magic);
02399         bool bXDAFile = ((magic == CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER) ? true : false);
02400         instr.close();
02401 
02402         return bXDAFile;
02403 }
02404 
02411 bool CCELFileData::IsVersion3CompatibleFile()
02412 {
02413         // Open the file.
02414         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
02415         if (!instr)
02416                 return false;
02417 
02418         bool status = false;
02419         const char *Version3Line = "[CEL]";
02420         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 16;
02421         char pszHeader[MAXLINELENGTH];
02422 
02423         // Extract the first line which should be [CEL] for a version 3 file
02424         instr.getline(pszHeader, MAXLINELENGTH);
02425         if (strncmp(pszHeader,Version3Line,strlen(Version3Line))==0)
02426                 status = true;
02427         instr.close();
02428         return status;
02429 }
02430 
02437 bool CCELFileData::IsTranscriptomeBcelFile()
02438 {
02439         // Open the file.
02440         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02441         if (!instr)
02442                 return 0;
02443 
02444         // Read the header marker from the file.
02445         char szMarker[BCEL_HEADER_LEN];
02446         ReadFixedCString(instr, szMarker, BCEL_HEADER_LEN);
02447         bool bTranscriptomeFile = false;
02448         if (strncmp(szMarker, BCEL_HEADER_BYTES, BCEL_HEADER_LEN) == 0)
02449                 bTranscriptomeFile = true;
02450         instr.close();
02451 
02452         return bTranscriptomeFile;
02453 }
02454 
02461 bool CCELFileData::IsCompactCelFile()
02462 {
02463         // Open the file.
02464         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02465         if (!instr)
02466                 return 0;
02467 
02468         // Read the header marker from the file.
02469         char szMarker[CCEL_HEADER_LEN];
02470         ReadFixedCString(instr, szMarker, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
02471         bool bCompactCelFile = false;
02472         if (strncmp(szMarker, CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN) == 0)
02473                 bCompactCelFile = true;
02474 
02475         instr.close();
02476 
02477         return bCompactCelFile;
02478 }
02479 
02486 bool CCELFileData::IsUnsupportedCompactCelFile()
02487 {
02488         // Open the file.
02489         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
02490         if (!instr)
02491                 return 0;
02492 
02493         // Read the header marker from the file.
02494         char szMarker[CCEL_HEADER_LEN];
02495         ReadFixedCString(instr, szMarker, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
02496         bool bCompactCelFile = false;
02497         if (strncmp(szMarker, OLD_CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN) == 0)
02498                 bCompactCelFile = true;
02499 
02500         instr.close();
02501 
02502         return bCompactCelFile;
02503 }
02504 
02513 void CCELFileData::DetermineFileFormat()
02514 {
02515         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
02516                 m_FileFormat = XDA_BCEL;
02517         else if (IsTranscriptomeBcelFile())
02518                 m_FileFormat = TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL;
02519         else if (IsCompactCelFile())
02520                 m_FileFormat = COMPACT_BCEL;
02521         else if (IsUnsupportedCompactCelFile())
02522                 m_FileFormat = 0;
02523         else
02524                 m_FileFormat = TEXT_CEL;
02525 }
02526 
02527 
02539 unsigned short CCELFileData::RoundNumber(float f)
02540 {
02541         assert(f >= 0);
02542         unsigned short us = (unsigned short) f;
02543         if((f - (float) us) >= 0.5)
02544                 us++;
02545         return us;
02546 }

02565         m_bReadOutliers = true;

02691 void CCELFileData::SetDimensions(int rows, int cols)
02692 {
02693         m_HeaderData.SetRows(rows);
02694         m_HeaderData.SetCols(cols);
02695         m_HeaderData.SetCells(rows * cols);
02696         GridCoordinatesType grid;
02697         grid.upperleft.x = 1;
02698         grid.upperleft.y = 1;
02699         grid.upperright.x = cols;
02700         grid.upperright.y = 1;
02701         grid.lowerleft.x = 1;
02702         grid.lowerleft.y = rows;
02703         grid.lowerright.x = cols;
02704         grid.lowerright.y = rows;
02705         m_HeaderData.SetGridCorners(grid);
02706 
02708   // delete [] m_lpData;
02709   // m_lpData=NULL;
02710         delete [] m_pEntries;
02711   m_pEntries=NULL;
02712         delete [] m_pTransciptomeEntries;
02713   m_pTransciptomeEntries=NULL;
02714   
02715         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
02716                 m_pTransciptomeEntries = new CELFileTranscriptomeEntryType[rows*cols];
02717         else if ((m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) || (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL))
02718                 m_pEntries = new CELFileEntryType[rows*cols];
02719         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL)
02720                 m_pMeanIntensities = new unsigned short[rows*cols];
02721 }
02722 
02730 void CCELFileData::SetChipType(const char *str)
02731 {
02732         assert(str != NULL);
02733         m_HeaderData.SetChipType(str);
02734         
02735         std::string strHeader = m_HeaderData.GetHeader();
02736 
02737         // Set the chip type in the header string.
02738         int endIndex = (int) strHeader.find(".1sq");
02739         int startIndex = (int) strHeader.rfind(" ", endIndex);
02740         int length = (int) strHeader.length();
02741 
02742         std::string start = strHeader.substr(0, startIndex + 1);
02743         std::string end = strHeader.substr(endIndex, length - endIndex);
02744         std::string newHeader = start + m_HeaderData.GetChipType() + end;
02745         m_HeaderData.SetHeader(newHeader.c_str());
02746 }

02847 void CCELFileData::SetIntensity(int x, int y, float intensity)
02848 {
02849         assert((x >= 0) && (x <= m_HeaderData.GetCols()));
02850         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));

02863 void CCELFileData::SetIntensity(int index, float intensity)
02864 {
02865         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02866 
02867         if (m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) 
02868         {
02869                 MmSetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Intensity,intensity);
02870         }
02871         else if (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL) 
02872         {
02873                 //m_pEntries[index].Mean = GetFloat(&intensity, m_FileFormat);
02874                 MmSetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Intensity,intensity);
02875         }
02876         else if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)    
02877         {
02878                 unsigned short s = RoundNumber(intensity);
02879                 MmSetUInt16_N(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Intensity,s);
02880         }
02881         else if (m_FileFormat == COMPACT_BCEL) 
02882         {
02883                 unsigned short s = RoundNumber(intensity);
02884                 //m_pMeanIntensities[index] = GetUShort(&s, m_FileFormat);
02885                 MmSetUInt16_I(&m_pMeanIntensities[index],s);
02886         }
02887         else 
02888         {
02889                 assert(0);
02890         }
02891 }

02918 void CCELFileData::SetStdv(int index, float stdev)

02920         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
02921 
02922         if (m_FileFormat == TRANSCRIPTOME_BCEL)
02923         {
02924                 unsigned short s = RoundNumber(stdev);
02925                 //m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Stdv = GetUShort(&s, m_FileFormat);
02926                 MmSetUInt16_N(&m_pTransciptomeEntries[index].Stdv,s);
02927         }
02928         else if ((m_FileFormat == TEXT_CEL) || (m_FileFormat == XDA_BCEL))
02929                 //m_pEntries[index].Stdv = GetFloat(&stdev, m_FileFormat);
02930                 MmSetFloat_I(&m_pEntries[index].Stdv,stdev);
02931         else if (m_FileFormat != COMPACT_BCEL) 
02932             assert(0);

02990 
02999 void CCELFileData::SetMask(int index, bool masked)
03000 {
03001         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03002 
03003         if (masked)
03004         {
03005                 m_MaskedCells.insert(std::make_pair(index, true));
03006                 m_HeaderData.IncrementMasked();
03007         }
03008         else
03009         {
03010                 std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.find(index);
03011                 if (pos != m_MaskedCells.end())
03012                 {
03013                         m_MaskedCells.erase(pos);
03014                         m_HeaderData.DecrementMasked();
03015                 }
03016         }
03017 }
03018

03031         assert((y >= 0) && (y <= m_HeaderData.GetRows()));

03044 void CCELFileData::SetOutlier(int index, bool outlier)
03045 {
03046         assert((index >= 0) && (index < m_HeaderData.GetCells()));
03047 
03048         if (outlier)
03049         {
03050                 m_Outliers.insert(std::make_pair(index, true));
03051                 m_HeaderData.IncrementOutliers();
03052         }
03053         else
03054         {
03055                 std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_Outliers.find(index);
03056                 if (pos != m_Outliers.end())
03057                 {
03058                         m_Outliers.erase(pos);
03059                         m_HeaderData.DecrementOutliers();
03060                 }
03061         }
03062 }
